content.description: Easy but enjoyable climbing down low leaves one staring at a blank face up high. Figure out your way through a balancy crux to the tantalizing jug just out of reach. Mantle the ledge and enjoy the cruise to the top.
The Line just left of the waterfall on the upper tier. Depending on the season this climb can be wet from the waterfall making it quite slippery. A fun climb that deserves to see more traffic.
content.protection: 5 Bolts, two bolt anchor with rings.
content.location: The Route just left of the waterfall.

content.description: Climb the huge roof and keep going up the overhanging face.
content.location: Right of Groove dynamics and left of liquid gold.

content.description: Climb the corner in the face to slab then finish on a great vertical wall, Fun and covers a variety of climbing
content.location: Left of Jungle Cruzer and right of Dirty Girls.

content.description: The line starts on delusions then moves right at the fourth permo through fun, pumpy movement.
pumpy line with hard opening then a second crux right before pulling a small roof

The nice extension to

Delusions

.
content.protection: Four permadraws to a Mussy hook anchor.
content.location: Clip the Delusions anchor and continue up!

content.description: Climbs the gold streak right of the roof. Hard and awesome.

climbs.name: Jungle Cruiser
climbs.fa: Mike Key, Retrobolted by Matt Myers

content.description: A fun climb on big holds and the easiest line at the upper tier. Interesting climbing with many good rests. finish up the arete to a good ledge with chain anchors.
content.location: Line left of Hippie girls, second left of Good girls.

content.description: Fun climbing with crux at third bolt, Continue up staying close to the arete. finish up to a nice ledge and the anchors.
content.protection: 6 bolts Shared Chain Anchor with "Little Girls"
content.location: Nice line to the Left of the Dihedral/"Good Girls" with brown and green hangers.

content.description: Great boulder problem start to slab then climb the rail out the roof. Really cool.
content.location: Right of good girls/delusions, left of taxi roof.

content.description:
Low angle, follows just left of the dihedral. Climb starts with a mantel after the first bolt and goes in to easy face climbing.

Just about the only warm-up in the Upper Falls.
content.protection: 6 bolts to chain anchors w/ Mussy hooks
content.location: Starts left of the dihedral and goes about straight up. Finishes on a ledge with two ring anchors. Rappel or lower off.

content.description: Fun traverse line that goes to the right after starting "bad boys".  After the 3rd bolt on "bad boys" traverse right just under the roof and continue traversing past a couple of bolts/permadraws and finish at the anchors.
content.protection: 6 bolts, Permadraws to chain anchors w/ Mussy hooks
content.location: Can be done with combining "good girls" for 1 pitch.  60m rope is long enough.

content.description: Shares the same start as Groove Dymanics, then follows the large bulge flake system through 2 hanging chains.  Once you get to a small roof head straight up through a series of small crimps and balancy moves for 5 bolts to quick shuts.  No move is crazy hard just very sustained crimping to the chains.  Very good route!
Climb "Hippie Girls" then continue up the arete past bolts then head up and left to a chain anchor. Can traverse left to the Ledge if heading up the slab.
content.protection: Bolts, Chain Anchor. 60m will lower off fine.
content.location: extension to hippie girls, left of bad boys

climbs.name: Dirty Girls
climbs.fa: Chris Schuessler, Morgan Diefenbach, Drew Taylor 2/7/2013

content.description: A steep start eases back to well-featured slab above before a vertical finish to the anchors. Fun moves.
content.location: The line second left of Jungle Cruise

content.description: A fun link-up that is a good warm-up for some of the other nearby routes.
content.location:
This route is a link-up between

Good Girls

and

Delusions

with one independent bolt.

content.description: Leftmost route on the upper tier. Start left from the log bench up 3 bolts of face. Stay right on the low angle terrain as there is a hard alternate line to the left. pass a small roof then you have two choices finish left in the dihedral which is better or go right on easier moves. finish on low angle slab to the anchors. lower off or go up and left to the Sidewalk ledge.
content.location: far left line from the log bench.

content.description: Crank a bouldery start past the first bolt, then wander up the slab above. More technical than its neighbor Dirty Girls
content.location: The line just left of Dirty Girls.

content.description: Easy climbing on the left face of the dihedral moves right across a triangular block down low. There's a nice ledge for a good rest, use it as there aren't many more opportunities. The climbing turns thin and reachy as you move back left into a seam where you'll find side pulls, pinches, stemming and interesting moves. Keep your cool and finish strong as you pull over the final lip.
content.protection: 8 bolts, chain anchors. Only one draw is needed on this as it's mostly protected by chain-draws.
content.location: As you come up to the upper falls, look left for a prominent dihedral. The climb starts in the corner and shares the 1st bolt with Good Girls.

content.description: this route is a 2nd pitch above "Good Girls in the upper falls area. vertical start with good holds. crux is at the top, getting to the 5th bolt(permadraw). finish at the chains on the left. fun climb!
content.protection: 5 bolts,last bolt has new permadraw..2 chains/anchors at top.
content.location: this route starts at the chains for "Good Girls". You can rap from the anchors, a 60m rope is just long enough.

content.description: A great climb for its grade with a mix of all styles of climbing. Start up the slab the cross over the bulge and finish strait up.
content.protection: 8 bolts,2 bolt anchor with rap rings and a 2 bolt belay anchor.
content.location: the right route on the right side of the upper tier.
